Glyph.Name: Flame Dart
Glyph.Description: Deal 1 Fire damage to target (undodgable).

Glyph.Name: Dark Dart
Glyph.Description: Deal 1 Void damage to target (undodgable).

Glyph.Name: Ice Dart
Glyph.Description: Deal 1 Frost damage to target (undodgable).

Glyph.Name: Bone Crack
Glyph.Description: Deals 8 Damage to target within 4 spaces. If IMP is 15 or more, Imobilize. (S)

Glyph.Name: Flash Bang
Glyph.Description: Deals 6 Damage to all targets within 2 spaces. Stagger 1 (S)

Glyph.Name: Laceration
Glyph.Description: Deal 8 damage. (Undodgeable.) Stagger 2. (S)

Glyph.Name: Camouflage
Glyph.Description: Assume the appearance of a tree for two turns and gain +15 sneak if not moving or taking actions (S)

Glyph.Name: Impact Snap
Glyph.Description: Deal 4 damage that ignores all armor.

Glyph.Name: Instinct of Fire
Glyph.Description: Deal 8 Auto Fire damage to yourself and every adjacent target.

Glyph.Name: Ignition
Glyph.Description: Set target on fire. Deals IMP lvl fire damage for d4 turns after this one.

Glyph.Name: Celestial Glare
Glyph.Description: Deal 5 Pure Light damage to target (S)

Glyph.Name: Impact Spike
Glyph.Description: Deal 15 damage that fully ignores any armor, but not shields.

Glyph.Name: Undying Fury
Glyph.Description: For 3 turns starting now, you may go to -15 health without dying.

Glyph.Name: Searing Bolt
Glyph.Description: Deal 8 Fire/Lightning damage to target. (S)

Glyph.Name: Flame Pillars
Glyph.Description: Create a 1x5 Barrier for 5 turns starting now. It deals 16 Fire damage

Glyph.Name: Entwined Fate
Glyph.Description: The next Physical Damage you are dealt is also dealt in Glyph form to target opponent. (You are both damaged.)

Glyph.Name: Sheathed in Flame
Glyph.Description: Deal Fire damage with all weapons until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Sheathed in Storm
Glyph.Description: Deal Shock damage with all weapons until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Tempest of Terror
Glyph.Description: For the next 4 turns after this one, the ememy team loses 5 Strength.

Glyph.Name: Lightning Spark
Glyph.Description: Deal 4 Shock damage to target. (S)

Glyph.Name: Charged Shot
Glyph.Description: Deal Imp. lvl damage to target. RCH 4

Glyph.Name: Destructive Charge
Glyph.Description: Deals 12 + d8 of Shock damage. (S)

Glyph.Name: Flame Splash
Glyph.Description: Target space and all adjacent spaces are dealt 10 + d20 fire damage. (S)

Glyph.Name: Snake's Dash
Glyph.Description: Roll 2 spaces away after a successfull parry.

Glyph.Name: Reap the Whirlwind
Glyph.Description: For 4 turns starting now, all ranged attacks are redirected to target you.

Glyph.Name: Lightning Strike
Glyph.Description: Deals 12 Shock damage to target within 10 spaces. KB 1 (S)

Glyph.Name: Charging Arc
Glyph.Description: Roll a d4. Deal that much Pure Shock damage to that many targets. Add that much speed on your next turn. (S)

Glyph.Name: Chromatic Blast
Glyph.Description: Deal 1 Pure damage of every type to up to 2 targets. (S)

Glyph.Name: Fire Charge
Glyph.Description: Deal 2 Pure Fire damage to every target within 2 spaces. Add 1 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Bolster
Glyph.Description: The next potion target takes this turn has double effect.

Glyph.Name: Snakeâ€™s Insight
Glyph.Description: Roll a d20, if you roll 8 or more, punch the weapon out of the enemy's hand. Add 1 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Blazing Pillar
Glyph.Description: Create a 2x5 Barrier for 7 turns starting now. It deals 10 Fire damage. (S)

Glyph.Name: Fire Storm
Glyph.Description: Deal 2 Pure Fire damage to 2 targets. (S)

Glyph.Name: Keen Reflexes
Glyph.Description: Roll a d20. If 12 or more: grab weapon out of adjacent enemy's hand.

Glyph.Name: Charge Snap
Glyph.Description: Deal 3 Pure Shock damage to target. Add 1 speed on your next turn. (S)

Glyph.Name: Charged Bolt
Glyph.Description: Deal Imp. lvl damage to target. Add 1 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Lightning Storm
Glyph.Description: Deal 10 Shock damage to target. Add 1 speed to your next turn. (S)

Glyph.Name: Boon of the Ancients
Glyph.Description: All enemies are knocked back by 2 from you. Heal all allies by 8.

Glyph.Name: Super Energy Blast
Glyph.Description: Deal 4 Pure light and 4 Pure fire damage. RCH 1 (S)

Glyph.Name: Uncaged Monster
Glyph.Description: For 4 turns starting now, you may ignore up to 13 damage each turn.

Glyph.Name: Will Breaker
Glyph.Description: Break target battle charm, you take 15 Fire Damage.

Glyph.Name: Charged Blast
Glyph.Description: Deal Imp. lvl damage to target. Gain 7 health. Add 1 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Reality Storm
Glyph.Description: Target has 5 less speed next turn.

Glyph.Name: Reverse Digestion
Glyph.Description: Target throws up.

Glyph.Name: Sheathed in Void
Glyph.Description: Deal Void damage with all weapons until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Binding Strike
Glyph.Description: Target gets -5 Str. for 3 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Retribution
Glyph.Description: The next Glyph damage you take this turn is also dealt to it's caster.

Glyph.Name: Ensnaring Evil
Glyph.Description: Weak target cannot move until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Vampiric Absorption
Glyph.Description: Absorb 8 health from an adjacent target.

Glyph.Name: Mutually Assured End
Glyph.Description: Deal 20 Glyph Damage to yourself and one target (S)

Glyph.Name: Self Infection
Glyph.Description: Gain 1 Void counter. Add 2 speed to your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Collective Trade
Glyph.Description: Drain 1 speed from each teammate, they gain 4 life.

Glyph.Name: Dark Flame Bolt
Glyph.Description: Deal 8 Flame/Void Damage. RCH 2. (S)

Glyph.Name: Leeching Pulse
Glyph.Description: Absorb 5 health from target. Add 1 speed on your next turn. (Cast once per turn.)

Glyph.Name: Mind Probe
Glyph.Description: Know which enemies are weak.

Glyph.Name: Animate Dead
Glyph.Description: You puppet target normal dead for 3 turns starting now. They have 7 speed.

Glyph.Name: Break Neck
Glyph.Description: Weak target gains "neck damage" counter. If they have 3 counters, they die.

Glyph.Name: Obscure
Glyph.Description: Make a Weak target blind until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Encage
Glyph.Description: For 3 turns starting now: if target moves, they take 8 Auto-Damage. (S)

Glyph.Name: Void Storm
Glyph.Description: Everyone in combat gets 1 Void Counter.

Glyph.Name: Despicable Deal
Glyph.Description: (Note: must be team's first action.) You and 3 teammates skip this turn. Deal 40 glyph damage to target.

Glyph.Name: Rest in Pieces
Glyph.Description: For 5 turns starting now: you are inactive; up to 5 targets cannot roll Acc, Dex, or Str. (they can only use static lvl)

Glyph.Name: Buying Time
Glyph.Description: Lose 3 health. Add 2 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Edge of Death
Glyph.Description: Lose all but 1 health. Add 30 speed to this turn. (Cast once per turn.)

Glyph.Name: Distortion of the Mind
Glyph.Description: Target loses 4 seconds on their next turn. Gain 4 seconds during your next turn. (Cast once per turn)

Glyph.Name: Shift
Glyph.Description: Lose 5 health. Teleport behind target person.

Glyph.Name: Ankle Crack
Glyph.Description: Break weak target's ankles (IMB).

Glyph.Name: Nerve Assault
Glyph.Description: Target is imobilized until end of turn. Your health capacity is reduced by 20 until end of combat.

Glyph.Name: Black Flame Jet
Glyph.Description: Deal Ins. lvl + Imp. Fire damage. RCH 3.

Glyph.Name: Binding Devestation
Glyph.Description: Target gets -10 Str. for 3 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Karmic Evil
Glyph.Description: "Battle charm." Until end of combat, magic health gain is now health loss.

Glyph.Name: Will Shaper
Glyph.Description: Break target battle charm. Each temmate loses 3 speed.

Glyph.Name: Infection
Glyph.Description: Target gains 1 void counter. (Cast once per turn.)

Glyph.Name: Mental Intrusion
Glyph.Description: Target loses 2 speed on their next turn. Add 2 speed on your next turn. (Cast't twice per turn.)

Glyph.Name: Suppression
Glyph.Description: No one (including you) can cast glyphs for 3 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Frightining Stare
Glyph.Description: Roll a d20. If 8 or more: your glyphs can't be dodged for 5 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Future Insight
Glyph.Description: "Battle Charm." Until end of combat, you may pay 5 life to re-roll any of your die rolls (including re-rolls).

Glyph.Name: Puppetier of Life
Glyph.Description: You puppet target dead for 7 turns starting now. They have 8 speed.

Glyph.Name: Unintended Consequences
Glyph.Description: Target ranged attack or glyph is instead directed at another possible target of your choice

Glyph.Name: Heart Extraction
Glyph.Description: Roll a d20. If 15 or more. you rip out target's heart. (cast once per turn.)

Glyph.Name: Mental Forclosure
Glyph.Description: You and weak target are inactive for 2 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Blight
Glyph.Description: Absorb 4 health from every target within 2 spaces. (Cast twice per turn.)

Glyph.Name: Void Spear
Glyph.Description: Deal 10 Fire damage to target. They get 2 void cointers. (S)

Glyph.Name: Enslave the Lesser
Glyph.Description: For 3 turns starting now: you are inactive; you control weak target. (you cannot make them kill themselves)

Glyph.Name: Paladin's Bolster
Glyph.Description: Add 3 BLDS, BLDG until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Ranger's Bolster
Glyph.Description: Add 3 GUNS, PLAR, until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Thief's Bolster
Glyph.Description: Add 3 BOWS, THRN until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Anticipation
Glyph.Description: Pit your INT to the magic skill of the caster. If you win it gets deflected; if you lose assume you did nothing.

Glyph.Name: Fool's Errand
Glyph.Description: Target teammate Adds 1 speed on this turn.

Glyph.Name: Totally Not Magelight
Glyph.Description: Create ball of light that follows target for 5 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Self Preservation
Glyph.Description: Gain 5 helath.

Glyph.Name: Renew
Glyph.Description: Add 6 health to every member of the party.

Glyph.Name: Vitality Buff
Glyph.Description: Add 4 health for self and vicinity.

Glyph.Name: Sheathed in Frost
Glyph.Description: Deal Freeze damage with all weapons until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Sheathed in Light
Glyph.Description: Deal Light damage with all weapons until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Ocular Mirroring
Glyph.Description: For 10 turns starting now, you see out of target's eyes

Glyph.Name: Ice Wall
Glyph.Description: Create a 1x5 Wall with 25 health.

Glyph.Name: Creature of the Night
Glyph.Description: Be able to see in pure darkness until end of turn.

Glyph.Name: Mental Spike
Glyph.Description: Deal 3 + X (X is the amount of times you've cast this glyph this combat). Add 1 speed on your next turn. (S)

Glyph.Name: Repel the Void
Glyph.Description: Heal 1 Void counter for self and vicinity.

Glyph.Name: Dissipate
Glyph.Description: Deflect any type of glyph. Lose 5 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Warding Shield
Glyph.Description: Reduce up to 12 glyph damage of the next attack.

Glyph.Name: Ice Storm
Glyph.Description: Deal 7 Frost damage to d4 targets. (S)

Glyph.Name: Fog Bank
Glyph.Description: Create 3 1x2 Barriers for 4 turns starting now. They take 3 speed to pass through.

Glyph.Name: Cloak of Deception
Glyph.Description: Make your self apear as target person for X turns starting now. X = INT lvl.

Glyph.Name: Cacophony
Glyph.Description: Fill the room (or area) with unbelievably loud noise for 3 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Lock Finder
Glyph.Description: Unlock simple lock.

Glyph.Name: Blink
Glyph.Description: The next attack passes trhough you without harm. Lose 5 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Atune Senses
Glyph.Description: Add 5 Perception to your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Silent Step
Glyph.Description: Add 5 Sneak to your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Rebuke the Void
Glyph.Description: Heal 2 Void counters for self and vicinity.

Glyph.Name: Redirection
Glyph.Description: Target glyph is redirected to target teammate.

Glyph.Name: Tradeoff
Glyph.Description: Add 1 speed to your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Fog wall of Dispair
Glyph.Description: Create a 1x5 barrier for 3 turns starting now. Only allies can pass through; ranged that goes through does half damage.

Glyph.Name: Blinding Barrier
Glyph.Description: Create 1x5 Barrier for 5 turns starting now. It deals 3 Pure Light damage, and STG 2. Add 1 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Teleportation
Glyph.Description: Transport yourself to target space within 10 spaces away. This is the only glyph you can cast for 3 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Accelerate
Glyph.Description: Add 2 speed on your next turn. (Cast once per turn)

Glyph.Name: Blood Regrowth
Glyph.Description: Cure target of poisons and infections.

Glyph.Name: Trickster of Fate
Glyph.Description: Teleport one space in any direction. You can't cast glyphs on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Flight
Glyph.Description: Fly up around 30 feet, then come back down.

Glyph.Name: Acrobat
Glyph.Description: Add 5 DEX for 2 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Telekinetic Storm
Glyph.Description: Throw debris at target. Deal INT lvl damage.

Glyph.Name: Glowing Outburst
Glyph.Description: Every enemy gets: STG 2, GB 1, KB 1. Add 1 speed to your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Will Bender
Glyph.Description: Break target battle charm, lose 3 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Copy Paper
Glyph.Description: Copy contents of target paper onto another.

Glyph.Name: Mimicry
Glyph.Description: Assume the total appearance of someone for 6 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Cold Fusiuon
Glyph.Description: Subtract 4 speed from target's next turn.

Glyph.Name: Glimpse the Unknown
Glyph.Description: Know a random glyph target person has equipped.

Glyph.Name: Sonic Charge
Glyph.Description: Deal 9 damage to target. STG 1. Add 1 speed to your next turn. (S)

Glyph.Name: Vapor Weapon
Glyph.Description: Create the apearance of any weapon in your hand.

Glyph.Name: Marksman's Eye
Glyph.Description: Add 4 ACC for 3 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Repayment
Glyph.Description: "Battle charm." Until end of combat, if you take damage: add 1 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Cloak
Glyph.Description: Become Invisible (add 12 Snek) for 3 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Refleciton Prism
Glyph.Description: Reflect target glyph back on it's caster. You cant use magic for 7 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Light Storm
Glyph.Description: Deal 1 Pure Light damage to everyone. Add 1 speed to your next turn. (S)

Glyph.Name: Momentum
Glyph.Description: For 3 turns starting now, when you cast a glyph: +1 speed on your next turn.

Glyph.Name: Shimmering Spells
Glyph.Description: Roll a d20. If 6 or more: your glyphs can't be countered for 3 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Expel the Void
Glyph.Description: Heal 3 Void counters for self and vicinity.

Glyph.Name: Ice Barricade
Glyph.Description: Create a 1x5 Wall with 100 health.

Glyph.Name: Ward of the Ancients
Glyph.Description: "Battle charm." Until end of combat, each turn you may ignore up to 10 glyph damage.

Glyph.Name: Rewind
Glyph.Description: Reset the speed of every teammate. (Cast twice per combat)

Glyph.Name: Vault Picker
Glyph.Description: Unlock complex lock.

Glyph.Name: Exile the Void
Glyph.Description: Heal 3 Void counters for self and vicinity. Affected cannot take Void counters for 3 turns starting now.

Glyph.Name: Breath of the Cosmos
Glyph.Description: Add 15 speed to this turn (play once per combat).

Glyph.Name: Cosmic Translation
Glyph.Description: Lose 5 health. Until end of turn, target memorized glyph becomes of type INT.
